text: Ate tusim jisa halata vica vi hude ho ate kura'ana vicom jo hisa vi suna rahe ho ate tusim loka jihara vi kama karade ho, tam asim tuhade upara gavaha rahide ham, jisa vele tusim usa vica lina hude ho. Tuhade raba tom (miti de) kana barabara vi ciza chipi nahim, na dharati te na akasam vica ate na usa tom choti ate na vadi. Paratu uha ika sapasata kitaba vica hai
